attributes.action: All dogs must be on a lead in a public place
attributes.additional_details: Being a runner when I’m out on a run I’m guaranteed to to be attacked, bitten or chased by a dog off its lead by irresponsible owners and when I’m out with my dogs they get harassed and sometimes attacked by other dogs not on there leads, This is a big issue in my area and many people have had similar issues
attributes.background: Make it law for all dogs to be kept on a lead when in a public place

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634272
